Wire is a wonderful chat tool, but some issues with the recent release. Wire let's you communicate securely and without much delay (unlike others). The interface has needed some work, and it seems to work better on android than iPhone. The recent release fixes likes to be more visible among other things, but now it takes longer to sync and search is broken (and moved to an odd place). This is still my first choice, but it does need some improvement, especially to fix the recently buggy release.

replyText:
Hi,

Appreciate the time taken to provide us with your valuable feedback. We are working on updating the app with new features and improvements. Please note that we are taking each and every feedbacks seriously.â€¨
If you are facing any issues please raise a ticket at https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us so that we can help you.

Thanks,
Support Team
text: Since yesterday may 14, 2023 I don't get notifications when messages came in. I have this app on both android and iOS. The app still sends out on iOS. replyText:
We appreciate the time taken to provide this feedback.
The new app is running on a completely new code base, which enables better performance and more reliability. For users to benefit from the enhanced stability, we had to disable a few features that are loved by our users, however they will all come back soon.
Wire Support Team
